We document the optimization procedure with `nloptr` using a small example of 3 foods, and 2 constraints (energy and protein). 

```{r}
#| label: small-demo
#| echo: true
#| eval: true

foods <- read.csv('data/foods.csv', sep = ',')
data.table::setDT(foods) # use data.table format
foods[1:10,] # show the first 10
```
